channel.title: News on 360º Virtual Tours in Gambia
channel.description: Recent content in News on 360º Virtual Tours in Gambia

item.title: My Business Provider!
item.description: Through collaboration with our Google Street View Trusted Photographer Eduard de Boer, we are now also a My Business Provider, not only for The Gambia, but also for Africa and the rest of the World!

item.title: Virtual tours in DEKA
item.description: We are proud to announce that the DEKA app that is to be launched tomorrow, will contain virtual tours of real estate properties offered both for sale and for rent in the Gambia, which have been and will be shot by us.
